RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since May 29 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Registered Foa ls Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LEA ME ALONE tracked top trio to the turn, three wide run quarter pole, clear. BANNED FROM MIDWAY broke tardy from the gate, trailed to the stretch, rallied on lat. MY ANGELICA inside speed to the stretch, could not go on in late stages. KENYA SUN raced off rail throughout while chasing to stretch, no late gain. SUPORB speed between horses to turn, bid at quarter pole, emptied out. LUCKY US between horses early on with a steady fade from the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: My Angelica
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the stretch, could not go on in late stages

ENTRY.NAME: Suporb
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed between horses to turn, bid at quarter pole, emptied out

ENTRY.NAME: Banned From Midway
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke tardy from the gate, trailed to the stretch, rallied on lat

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Us
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses early on with a steady fade from the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Kenya Sun
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced off rail throughout while chasing to stretch, no late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Lea Me Alone
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked top trio to the turn, three wide run quarter pole, clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: H Steve Conboy DVM & Robert Courtney

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 5F Turf CR: 47. Maiden Special Weight Purse 23700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MR. BALI bit tardy start, no speed to turn, kicked in the late stretch to get up in time with aheady ride in the final sixteenth. GRAY DAY slow into stride from inside, angled out into stretch, coming on. SHOWTIME BOY speed to the front from outside, led to deepstetch, outkicked. FACTUM'S STAR three wide run to the turn, chased in the stretch, game effort. GRAND ZHOUL raced along evenly with no late kick when needed in the stretch. PALACE TEMPTATION saved ground throughout to no avail. NEW YORK MIRACLE broke sharp, could not keep up to the turn, faded and galloped past the wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow into stride from inside, angled out into stretch, coming on

ENTRY.NAME: Palace Temptation
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout to no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Zhoul
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late kick when needed in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Factum's Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: three wide run to the turn, chased in the stretch, game effort

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Bali
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tardy start, no speed to turn, kicked in stretch, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: New York Miracle
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, could not keep up to the turn, galloped past wire

ENTRY.NAME: Showtime Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front from outside, led to deepstetch, outkicked

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Special Weight Purse 23700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ARTISTIC LANEY tracked top pair to turn, roused into the stretch four wide to go clear while ridden out to the wire. PRETTY PATTY rushed outside to the front, stayed to deep stretch, gamely best of the rest. TWISTED JUSTICE quick from the gate, chased leader to the stretch, weakened late. MISS SPRINGSTEEN slow break, settled back with no late run in the stretch. FAREWELL KISS pushed along from gate with no response while evenly throughout. PARLAY CHARLIE awkward start and raced far back throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Artistic Laney
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked top pair to turn, roused into stretch, cleared ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Twisted Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick from the gate, chased leader to the stretch, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Parlay Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start and raced far back throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Springsteen
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Townley James E
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow break, settled back with no late run in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Farewell Kiss
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pushed along from gate with no response while evenly throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Patty
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed outside to the front, stayed to deep stretch, gamely

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Turf CR: 67. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to t he Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT FAVORITE sgahrp break, dueled to the half inside, roused to go well clear. IN A PEACH settled in good position throughout no match in a good effort. BLUE TORNADO inside position throughout to far turn, angled out for show spot. GAMBI no speed from inside to far turn, improved position in stretch. IN OPEN COURT saved ground to quarter pole, angled out with no late kick. SAINT SISTA threw head after the start, rushed outside, could not keep up. STORY CHANNEL raced back throughout with a wide stretch run to no avail. BIRD SET FREE broke well, three wide run to the lead, dueled to half, empty. IZABELLABELLA trailed to the half, never factored from outside in stretch run.

ENTRY.COMMENT: sgahrp break, dueled to the half inside, roused to go well clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Claiming Purse 9100. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAZOKU broke slow while inside to turn, split horses into the turn, got through past the quarter pole with clear sailing while ridden out to the wire. WANNAGOCAMPING between horses to the turn, rallied along from the turn, split horses in the upper stretch while no match for the winner. YOU'RE A DANDY broke well outside, well placed while evenly throughout off rail. to far turn, bore out into far turn, kept on in the stretch for the show so SHADY DAISY hustled along early, raced along evenly throughout inside. SHE'S A KEEPER dueled to the turn, stayed to stretch and gave in readily. VIVI BRASS broke awkwardly from the gate, never a menace throughout. SLOAN STREET speed to turn, bore out into the far turn to quarter pole while backing up on empty. FOLLOWING THE FINISH THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN ON THE TOTE BOARD INTO THE RUNNING THROUGH THE TURN, AFTER REVIEW IT'S DEEMED THERE WOULD NO CHANGE AND THE RACE WAS DECLARED OFFICIAL.

ENTRY.NAME: Mazoku
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slow while inside to turn, s=plit horses while ridden out

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Emerald Q Partners, Inc. & TCR Ranch

ENTRY.NAME: Shady Daisy
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC Tribbett Robert L and Bechtel Glenn
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along early, raced along evenly throughout inside

ENTRY.NAME: Wannagocamping
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses to the turn, split foes stretch for place

ENTRY.NAME: Vivi Brass
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkwardly from the gate, never a menace throughout

ENTRY.NAME: She's a Keeper
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled to the turn, stayed to stretch gave in readily

ENTRY.NAME: Sloan Street
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to turn, checked sharply to quarter pole, backed up

ENTRY.NAME: You're a Dandy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well outside, well placed while evenly throughout off rail

(Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGIC PALACE well rationed throughout under good handling while ridden out to the wire. VOTARY good position throughout while no match for winner best of rest. JACKIE'S LOVE loped along off rail to far turn, outside run for show spot. KINGMAKING (GB) off rail run to far turn, never untracked while evenly stretch. BRYLEE chased pace to the half with a fade back from far turn. JOEZINE lost position to the half and dropped far back.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 5F Turf CR: 88. Handicap Purse 20000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE-YEARS-OLD AND UPWARD. Free Nomination by Tuesday June 20, 2023. Weights Assigned Thursday June 22, 2023. High Weights. And Ohio Bred Preferred. Entries will close at normal time of closing. Should this race be determined to ru n on the dirt the distance will remain the same. Nominations closed Tuesday, June 20, 2023 with 21 nominations. (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIS BOOM BOB quick to the front, well handled to stay clear while ridden out to the wire as much the best. BLEST LIFE chased winner throughout while no match while holding place. A LOT OF SPUNK good position to the turn, ran on to improve position for show. TROUBLE MAKING outside run throughout to close the gap through the stretch run. MY HEAD HURTS saved ground throughout with no late kick when needed. MS TEMPTATION chased to the turn while retreating into the stretch run. FOR THE BISCUIT broke a bit slow, never menaced throughout. DISTINCTIVE FLOWER never a menace throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: A Lot of Spunk
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to the turn, ran on to improve position for show

ENTRY.NAME: dq-My Head Hurts
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout with no late kick when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Distinctive Flower
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a menace throughout

ENTRY.NAME: For the Biscuit
ENTRY.OWNER: Spadone Emil John and Stephenson Kate

ENTRY.NAME: Blest Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner throughout while no match while holding place

ENTRY.NAME: Trouble Making
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside run throughout to close the gap through the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Ms Temptation
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased to the turn while retreating into the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Sis Boom Bob
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to the front, well handled to stay clear ridden out to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 29, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ELI perfect position throughout while well handled with a steady run to far turn, ran on the final sixteenth, edged clear. CACAHUETE chased leader to far turn, angled in late going and all out to hold the place spot on the wire. LUCKYINKENTUCKY between horses first turn, raced back to far turn with a run into the stretch while coming on too late. FEELING IT sent to the front, led to deep stretch, drifted out a bit in late going while tiring. GOTSOMEMOJO never menaced throughout. HONDO GUSTO always back with no response throughout. CONGRATS THIS good position from inside to the half with nothing left.

ENTRY.NAME: Congrats This
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position from inside to the half with nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Luckyinkentucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses first turn, raced back to far turn coming on late

ENTRY.NAME: Feeling It
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent to the front, led to deep stretch drifted out in late going

ENTRY.NAME: Eli
ENTRY.COMMENT: perfect position throughout well handled, steady run edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Hondo Gusto
ENTRY.COMMENT: always back with no response throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Gotsomemojo
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Cacahuete
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to far turn, angled in late going held place spot
